description: Browse 200,000+ open-source vector icons across 200+ sets. Search and filter by collection or name to find the perfect icon fast. Get ready-to-use code snippets for React, Vue, Svelte, and more.

capabilities.name: get_all_icon_sets
capabilities.description: Browse all available icon collections from Iconify (200+ icon sets with 200,000+ icons). Returns a list of all icon sets with their metadata including name, total icons, author, license, and sample icons.

capabilities.name: get_icon_set
capabilities.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific icon set including all available icons in that set. Provide the icon set prefix (e.g., 'mdi', 'fa', 'bi').

capabilities.name: search_icons
capabilities.description: Search through Iconify's icon collection with flexible query parameters. Returns matching icons from all icon sets or a specific set.

capabilities.name: get_icon_data
capabilities.description: Retrieve specific icon data with usage examples for popular frameworks (React, Vue, Svelte, etc.). Provide the full icon name in format 'prefix:icon-name' (e.g., 'mdi:home', 'fa:user').
